thread.title: Actor Randy Quaid says Canada could deport him next week
thread.title_full: Actor Randy Quaid says Canada could deport him next week

title: Actor Randy Quaid says Canada could deport him next week
text: > Top News Actor Randy Quaid says Canada could deport him next week FILE - In this Oct. 28, 2010 file photo, actor Randy Quaid arrives for an immigration hearing in Vancouver. Quaid says he could be deported from Canada next week and says he'd like to make movies in the U.S. again. He says he was detained by Canada Border Services on Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. Immigration and Refugee Board spokesman Robert Gervais confirms the arrest and says Quaid will have a detention review hearing Thursday. (AP Photo/The Canadian Press, Jonathan Hayward, File)
